product_name: Inov8 F-lite 232 Cross-Training Shoes - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Ultralight with barefoot-inspired shape, the men's Inov8 F-Lite 232 cross-training shoes feature minimal cushioning and flexible outsoles that engage muscles in the feet and lower legs while training.
short_description: Ultralight with barefoot-inspired shape, the men's Inov8 F-Lite 232 cross-training shoes feature minimal cushioning and flexible outsoles that engage muscles in the feet and lower legs while training.
